body:
Reading Companion is a web-based literacy service that offers a wide variety of stories and texts in French. 

It is an exciting and fun web-based literacy solution!

header: What is the purpose of Reading Companion?
body:
Worldwide, children and adults alike struggle to read. 

There are a lot of reasons for which a person might be unable to read or finds great difficulty in the task at hand. The difficulties faced when reading vary from impoverished exposure to the source language, text length to complex vocabulary. 

One of the demanding tasks in reading tasks is finding suitable texts in terms of difficulty. 

The solution of the system at hand comes in defining and controlling those variables to find suitable reading material for the user depending on their reading level and objectives.

French is the second most-widely taught language after English, with most of the worldâ€™s French speaking population residing in Africa. 

It is the fastest growing language on the African continent in terms of official and foreign language. 

However, literacy in African countries roughly averages 70%. 

Increasing literacy skills demands practice and exposure to reading material. Reading helps expand vocabulary and shows the reader correct use of idioms and clauses.  A study has also shown that reading strengthens brain connectivity. Furthermore, reading researchers found that regular readers, starting at a young age, gradually develop large vocabularies. 

Vocabulary size and language fluency can impact many areas of life, from standardized scores to admissions in jobs and colleges.
